data.prayer: Father, encourage the 33 believers in Valduz to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Valduz, Liechtenstein

data.prayer: Father, move the 33 believers in the state of Valduz to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Valduz, Liechtenstein.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Valduz to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, there are 4,502 people in the state of Valduz who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 33 believers in Valduz and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Valduz, Liechtenstein, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Valduz, Liechtenstein that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Valduz, Liechtenstein has a population of 5,800.

We estimate Valduz has 33 people who might know Jesus, 4,502 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,266 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 175 neighbors who need Jesus.
